line_1: Secure of wing, thou dar'st revile.
line_2: When thus the Dog with scornful smile.

line_1: The taunt of scorn, the dark revile,
But the Redresser of those wrongs Revile.
line_2: The Author of our Ills, a God we stile;

line_1: And sleeping Laws the King's Neglect revile.
line_2: Causes unjudg'd disgrace the loaded File;
